item.title: Write Tests With Sentences First, Code Second
item.description: Photo by Ben White on Unsplash Problem In software, naming is often said to be one of the hardest parts. From what Iâ€™ve seen, writing tests is right up there too! Naming is hard because developers are rarely given a guide to naming. Over time, they learn tips and tricks and develop strategies to make naming easier.
